required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Eriobotyra Japonica Lindley Extract on Improvement of Cognitive Function
clinical_study.official_title: Efficacy and Safety of Eriobotyra Japonica Lindley Extract on Improvement of Cognitive Function: a 12 Week, Randomized Double-blind, Placebo-controlled Clinical Trial

brief_summary.textblock: The investigators performed a 12-week, randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled human trial to evaluate the efficacy and safety of Eriobotyra Japonica Lindley Extract on improvement of Memory Function. The investigators measured decrement of improvement of Memory Function, including K-MMSE, Rey-Kim Memory Test, BCRS, and PRMQ, and monitored their blood pressure.

primary_outcome.measure: Changes in K-MMSE(Korean Mini-Mental State Examination)
primary_outcome.description: K-MMSE(Korean Mini-Mental State Examination) was measured in study visit 1(0 week) and visit 3(12 week).

secondary_outcome.description: Rey-Kim Memory Test was measured in study visit 1(0 week) and visit 3(12 week).

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in BCRS(Brief Cognitive Rating Scale)
secondary_outcome.description: BCRS(Brief Cognitive Rating Scale) was measured in study visit 1(0 week) and visit 3(12 week).

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in PRMQ(Prospective and retrospective memory questionnaire)
secondary_outcome.description: PRMQ(Prospective and retrospective memory questionnaire) was measured in study visit 1(0 week) and visit 3(12 week).
STAI(State-trait anxiety inventory) was measured in study visit 1(0 week) and visit 3(12 week).

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in BDNF(Brain derived neurotrophic factor)
secondary_outcome.description: BDNF(Brain derived neurotrophic factor) was measured in study visit 1(0 week) and visit 3(12 week).

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Males and females 16-19 years old
- Weight within Â±30% of ideal body weight
- Able to give informed consent
Exclusion Criteria:
- Allergic or hypersensitive to any of the ingredients in the test products
- History of reaction to any of the test products or of gastrointestinal diseases such as Crohn's disease or gastrointestinal surgery
- History of alcohol or substance abuse
- Participation in any other clinical trials within past 2 months
- Laboratory test, medical or psychological conditions deemed by the investigators to interfere with successful participation in the study
- Pregnant or lactating women etc.

facility.name: Clinical Trial Center for Functional Foods; Chonbuk National University Hospital

responsible_party.investigator_title: Principal Investigator, Clinical Trial Center for Functional Foods
